```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
penguins %>%
  dplyr::group_by(species, island) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(mean_mass = mean(body_mass_g, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  kable(col.names = c("species", "Island", "Body mass (g)")) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = FALSE) # full width will make it as wide as the entire document
```
